name: Fun Police at the Suez Canal
name_original: Fun Police at the Suez Canal
description:
You are a cargo ship captain who wants to block the Suez Canal, but the Fun Police don't want that to happen! Answer their confusing questions correctly or they will figure out what you're really here for!

I had a lot less time this week for coding than I expected so here is a quick Scratch version of what I wanted to make, complete with ms paint-ish art. It is 3 am as I am publishing this, so hopefully it's all working.
